column1: In September 23 Democrats pledged to work with Republicans to pass COVID relief if Nancy Pelosi refused to get a deal done.  It's almost December. Nancy Pelosi is still playing her games.  Where are these 23 Democrats?

Governor Wolf once again issued confusing and inconsistent directives in his latest COVID mandates.   I joined fellow PA Republicans in requesting Wolf & Sec. Levine clarify their mask mandate that requires high school athletes to wear masks while playing sports. https://t.co/QmpQ8eSg9f
